bropals.lib.simplegame.leveldesigner

Interface EditableLevel<T extends EditableEntity>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of entity that the level contains.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEditableLevel

    public interface EditableLevel<T extends EditableEntity>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEditable(T editable)
      Add an editable entity to this level.
      void clearLevel()
      Remove everything that resides in this level to bring it to its empty state.
      java.util.List<T> getEditables()
      Gets a list of editable entities that reside in this world.
      void loadLevel(java.io.InputStream stream)
      Loads a level data into this level by the given file location.
      void removeEditable(T editable)
      Removes an editable entity to this level.
      void saveLevel(java.io.OutputStream stream)
      Saves this level at the given file location.

    • Method Detail

      • addEditable

        void addEditable(T editable)
        Add an editable entity to this level.
        Parameters:
        editable - the editable entity to add.

      • removeEditable

        void removeEditable(T editable)
        Removes an editable entity to this level.
        Parameters:
        editable - the editable entity to remove.

      • getEditables

        java.util.List<T> getEditables()
        Gets a list of editable entities that reside in this world.
        Returns:
        gets the list of the editable entities in the world.

      • saveLevel

        void saveLevel(java.io.OutputStream stream)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Saves this level at the given file location. One should not forget to save the render layer, position, and size properties for each EditableEntity.
        Parameters:
        stream - the output stream to the level file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with saving the level.

      • loadLevel

        void loadLevel(java.io.InputStream stream)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a level data into this level by the given file location. One should not forget to read the render layer, position, and size properties for each EditableEntity.
        Parameters:
        stream - the input stream to the level file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with loading the level.

      • clearLevel

        void clearLevel()
        Remove everything that resides in this level to bring it to its empty state.
